CustomField.description: The date on which the group was invited to apply with a full proposal (ie Invite letter sent). If the proposal was not "invited", then Date Received from the linked proposal is used.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The date on which the group was invited to apply with a full proposal (ie Invite letter sent). If the proposal was not "invited", then Date Received from the linked proposal is used.
CustomField.label: Date invited
